channel.title: [HELP] i need help making a donator shop
channel.description: [b][size=12pt]Hey my current shop has 0 value for each thing how do i fix/make new donator shop ?[/size][/b]

item.title: [HELP] i need help making a donator shop
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

You need to Compile, Close down your Run.bat or Server.bat and re-open it.
(Close the batch file that is keeping your server up) And then restart it again.

Read full topic

item.source: [HELP] i need help making a donator shop

item.title: [HELP] i need help making a donator shop
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“Mdc Skiller, post:4, topic:346311”][quote author=Kayceee link=topic=442693.msg3250998#msg3250998 date=1277756400]
Do you mean your current shop has no stock?
If so and you are using anything between 317 and 474 Client base, you will need to open your source files and look for shops.cfg
Open it up in notepad and look for the correct shop, change the 0’s on that shop line to whatever you want the stock to be.

If you get confused or that isn’t what you meant, let me know.
[/quote]
Umm i thought i found the shop but i didnt help ???[/quote]
You’re trying to change the prices of the items, right?

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] i need help making a donator shop
